body_html: @zhanghaoyue The GPU version should be okay. According to the benchmark done at 0.4.0, the difference should be very small. So there must be something else wrong there with your code. However, for the CPU version, it may be 1.5x-2x slower in Resnet50, SqueezeNet, DenseNet and about 10x slower in MobileNet.

body: @zhanghaoyue The GPU version should be okay. According to the benchmark done at 0.4.0, the difference should be very small. So there must be something else wrong there with your code. However, for the CPU version, it may be 1.5x-2x slower in Resnet50, SqueezeNet, DenseNet and about 10x slower in MobileNet.
